The cable connection pivots and rotates for effortless installation, while its pull-resistant design enhances protection against forced entry. Simple to set up, this lock offers a reliable way to physically secure your device and prevent theft.

name: Everglow Rechargeable Emergency Bulb
description: Keep your space lit during loadshedding with the Gizzu Everglow Rechargeable Downlight Bulb. This 3W GU10 bulb features a built-in 300mAh battery that recharges in about 5 hours and provides up to 5 hours of emergency light. It automatically switches to cool white mode during power cuts and offers adjustable brightness levels of 25%, 50%, and 100% through a simple on/off toggle. Smart Bulb Technology ensures it detects power failures and activates only when needed.

Smart Bulb Technology

It features a 10400mAh high capacity lithium-ion battery, a compact design, comes with a sparkless smart cable, built-in LED flashlight, Smart Protection, a durable carry case and supports up to 5l petrol and 3l diesel vehicles.

name: Hero Maz 1024WH/1000W Power Station
description: The Gizzu Hero Max UPS Power Station provides 1024Wh of reliable portable power for appliances and devices during load-shedding or outdoor use. It features multiple output ports, pure sine wave technology for smooth power switching, and a fast-charging LiFePO4 battery that recharges in 1.3 hours. With safety protections and support for appliances up to 1200W, it's a durable and versatile solution for home or adventure.

description: The Gizzu Hero Pro UPS Power Station delivers 2048Wh of portable power for both outdoor adventures and home use during load-shedding. It supports multiple devices with dual AC outlets, USB and Type-C ports, DC outputs, a car socket, and an XT60 port. Featuring pure sine wave technology and UPS functionality, it ensures uninterrupted power during outages. Its fast-charging LiFePO4 battery recharges fully in just 2 hours and lasts up to 3500 cycles. With safety protections and support for appliances up to 2400W, the Hero Pro is a reliable, durable, and versatile power solution.

name: Mi Smart LED Desk Lamp Pro
description: This smart desk lamp offers wide, even lighting with flexible three-axis adjustment, a 116 mm LED panel, and eye-friendly, flicker-free illumination. It features stepless brightness and colour temperature control plus dual voice-control support, giving you customizable, comfortable light for any workspace.

name: Mi 4K Laser Projector 150 Inch
description: Enjoy a true home-theater experience with this ultra short-throw laser projector, capable of projecting an 80–150 inch screen from just 5–50 cm away. Powered by ALPD 3.0 technology and a 3000:1 native contrast ratio, it delivers bright, sharp, and colour-rich visuals with 1080p resolution and HDR support. Its anti-direct vision sensor enhances eye safety, while the compact design fits easily on a TV cabinet or wall mount.
features: Projects a large 80–150 inch screen from an ultra short distance of just 5–50 cm.
Uses ALPD 3.0 laser technology for bright, sharp, and vivid image quality.
Offers a high 3000:1 native contrast ratio for clear detail in dark scenes.

name: Xiaomi Smart Camera C500 Pro
description: The Xiaomi Smart Camera C500 Pro offers ultra-clear 3K video, 360° coverage, and smart AI detection for humans, pets, and baby cries. It features two-way audio, voice assistant support, and a retractable lens shield with advanced encryption, ensuring full security and privacy.
features: Captures ultra-clear 3K video (5 MP sensor) with HDR and low-light color or infrared modes.
Provides 360° horizontal and 114° vertical coverage via dual-motor pan–tilt–zoom — no blind spots.
Smart AI detection notifies you about humans, pets, baby cries or loud noises, with customizable monitoring zones.
Offers two-way voice communication, plus support for voice control through Alexa or Google Assistant.
Includes a physical retractable lens shield and MJA1 security chip with AES-128 encryption for strong privacy protection.
Supports flexible storage options: microSD (up to 256 GB), NAS or encrypted cloud, with efficient H.265 video encoding.

name: Mi Smart Kettle Pro
description: The Mi Smart Kettle Pro is a high‑capacity smart electric kettle that brings precision temperature control and modern convenience to your kitchen. With a clear HD digital display, adjustable temperature settings (40 – 90 °C), and a 1.5 L stainless‑steel interior, it lets you boil water quickly or keep water warm for hours — ideal for tea, coffee, baby formula, and more. Its double‑wall design keeps the exterior cool, while built‑in safety protections and automatic shut‑off give you peace of mind. Sleek, practical, and easy to use, this kettle blends performance, safety, and style.
features: Real‑time temperature display on an HD digital screen.
Adjustable temperature modes from 40 °C to 90 °C for different uses (e.g. warm water, tea, coffee, baby formula).
1.5 L capacity, enough to serve multiple cups without frequent refilling.
1800 W high‑power heating for fast boiling.
Interior made of food‑grade 304 stainless steel, resistant to rust and odors, and easy to clean.
Double‑wall insulated body. Stays cool outside while keeping water hot inside.
Triple safety protection: automatic shut-off after boiling, dry‑burn prevention, and electric shock protection.
Large, easy-clean spout and a well-designed lid for safe pouring and maintenance.
Neat design with a power cord storage base for a tidy kitchen look.

name: Xiaomi LCD Writing Tablet 13.5 Inch
description: The Xiaomi 13.5 Color LCD Writing Tablet lets you write, draw, and erase instantly with vivid, pressure-sensitive strokes. Lightweight, portable, and eye-friendly, it’s perfect for notes, sketches, and creative ideas anywhere.
features: 13.5 inch color LCD panel with vivid, paper-like strokes.
Pressure-sensitive writing for expressive lines.
One-tap erase for instant clearing.
Magnetic stylus with built-in storage.
Slim, lightweight, and portable design.
Eye-friendly display with no blue-light emission.
Long-lasting battery, up to a year.

name: Xiaomi Mi Power Bank 3 Ultra Compact
description: The Xiaomi 10000mAh Mi Power Bank 3 Ultra Compact is a lightweight, pocket-sized power bank capable of charging your smartphone up to three times. With triple-device charging, Type-C two-way fast charging, and multiple input/output ports, it’s ideal for smartphones, tablets, and devices like the Nintendo Switch. Advanced circuitry ensures stable voltage, high conversion efficiency, and multi-protection, making it a reliable everyday power companion.
features: Ultra-compact and portable design (≈200 g).
10000 mAh high capacity for multiple full charges.
OTriple-device charging with Type-C + 2 USB-A ports.
Type-C two-way fast charging, up to 22.5 W.
Multiple input options: Type-C and Micro-USB.
Advanced circuitry with voltage stabilization and multi-protection.
Compatible with smartphones, tablets, and the Switch.

name: Xiaomi Mi USB‑C Cable
description: The Xiaomi Mi USB‑C Cable (White) is a simple yet reliable charging and data cable, compact, reversible, and built for everyday use. It connects Type‑C devices (phones, tablets, laptops, power banks) with ease and supports both charging and data transfer in a sturdy, flexible design.
features: Reversible USB‑C connector. Plug in either way without worrying about orientation.
Supports fast charging (up to 3A) and standard data transfer, delivering reliable power and syncing.
Durable build with a flexible TPE outer jacket and reinforced connector joints to resist bending and wear.
USB 2.0-compatible. Provides stable charging and data transfer for most modern devices using USB‑C.

name: Mi Wireless Outdoor Security Camera 1080
description: The Xiaomi Mi Wireless Outdoor Security Camera 1080p Set is a fully‑wireless, weather‑resistant surveillance solution ideal for securing homes, gardens, driveways, or small businesses. With a Full HD 1080p camera, wide-angle view, battery power, and an included indoor receiver. It delivers clear video day or night, smart motion detection, and flexible storage options. Installation is simple and cable‑free, while robust build and IP65 rating make it suitable for outdoor use in varied weather.
features: Full HD (1920×1080) resolution with a 130° wide‑angle lens and F2.1 aperture for broad coverage and sharp detail.
Wire‑free design with a 5700 mAh built‑in battery. Lasts up to ~90 days on a single charge (depending on usage).
PIR human motion detection (up to ~7 m range), sending instant alerts to your phone when movement is sensed.
Night vision + wide dynamic range (WDR) ensures clear video even in low light or contrasting light conditions.
IP65 dust‑ and water‑resistant housing, built to withstand outdoor conditions from –20°C to 50°C.
Flexible storage options: Save video locally via MicroSD (up to 32 GB) or USB drive, or use cloud storage via the indoor receiver.
One indoor receiver can support up to four outdoor cameras. Useful for monitoring multiple areas with a single hub.
Two‑way audio (built-in microphone and speaker). Lets you talk directly through the camera (e.g. to delivery people or guests) when paired with the companion app.

name: Xiaomi 1080P Wireless Camera and Receiver
description: The Xiaomi Mi Wireless Outdoor Security Camera 1080p is a wireless, weatherproof camera with Full HD video, 130° wide-angle view, night vision, two-way audio, and motion alerts, providing easy, reliable outdoor security with flexible storage options.
features: Full HD 1080p resolution for clear detail day and night.
130° wide-angle lens for broad coverage of driveways, gardens, or entrances.
Wireless, battery-powered design (built-in ~5700 mAh battery) for up to 90 days per charge. No wiring needed.
PIR human detection with ~7 m range, sending instant alerts on motion or suspicious activity.
Night vision + WDR technology + f/2.1 aperture. Ensures clear video even in low light or backlit conditions.
Weatherproof with IP65 rating. Works reliably outdoors in temperatures from about –20 °C to 50 °C.
Two-way audio (microphone + speaker). Lets you communicate through the camera via your smartphone.
Supports multiple storage options. Local (MicroSD card / USB) or optional cloud storage, depending on your preference.

name: Xiaomi Mi Smart Sport Wireless Watch
description: Stay on top of your fitness with the Xiaomi Sporty Smart Wireless Watch, the ultimate companion for an active lifestyle. Featuring a sleek, sporty design, this watch offers a range of smart features including 24-hour heart rate monitoring, 117 sports modes, and water resistance up to 5 ATM. Track your workouts, monitor your daily activity, and make the most of every exercise with this versatile and stylish wearable.
features: 24-Hour Continuous Heart Rate Monitoring – Track your heart performance during exercise and rest.
117 Custom Sports Modes – Supports a wide range of sports and activities.
Water Resistant up to 5 ATM – Swim or shower without worry.
Sleep Quality Monitoring – Provides detailed analysis of sleep stages.
Long-Lasting Battery – Up to 14 days of regular use.
Built-in GPS – Records outdoor activities accurately.
Magnetic Fast Charging – Quick and convenient charging.

name: Xiaomi Handheld Vacuum Cleaner G9/G10 HEPA Filter
description: Revitalize your Mi Vacuum Cleaner G10 or G9 with the Xiaomi Mi Vacuum Cleaner G10/G9 HEPA Filter Pack. This pack includes 2 pre-HEPA filters and 1 HEPA filter for superior cleaning performance. It’s easy to install, simple to clean, budget-friendly, and delivers H12 filtration efficiency, while the pre-HEPA filters help maintain stronger suction and longer-lasting performance.
features: 2 × Pre‑HEPA Filters and 1 × HEPA Filter included.
H12‑grade filtering performance for cleaner exhaust air.
Washable and reusable filters — easy to clean for repeated use.
Budget‑friendly replacement pack.
Compatible with Xiaomi Mi Vacuum Cleaner G9 and G10 models.
Made from high‑density filter material for durability and efficiency.
Simple to install — plug & play replacement without hassle.
Helps maintain strong suction and prolong vacuum cleaner’s lifespan by trapping larger particles before they reach the main HEPA filter.

name: Xiaomi Vacuum Cleaner G10 Plus Battery Pack
description: Extend your cleaning sessions with the Xiaomi Vacuum Cleaner G10 Plus Extended Battery Pack. This pack includes an expansion dock that lets you charge and store an extra battery while you clean. Simply place the expansion dock on the charging dock, and both the vacuum and replacement battery can charge simultaneously using a single cable. Designed for Xiaomi G10 Plus vacuums, it provides up to 65 minutes of additional runtime in Eco mode, ensuring uninterrupted cleaning.
features: Extension dock included: comes with an extra dock to charge and store the replacement battery.
Simultaneous charging: Once the expansion dock is placed on the main charging dock, both the vacuum and the spare battery can charge at the same time with a single cable.
Extended runtime: Provides up to 65 minutes of extra working time in Eco mode (on top of the regular battery).
Rechargeable Li‑ion battery: The extra battery uses a lithium‑ion cell with 3000 mAh capacity.
Plug‑and‑play spare battery: Tesigned specifically to be compatible with the Xiaomi G10 Plus vacuum model.
Lightweight & compact pack: Battery pack weight ~ 600 g and compact dimensions. Easy to store and handle.

name: Mi 16-in-1 Ratchet Screwdriver

name: Xiaomi Mi Portable Bluetooth Speaker - Grey
description: The Xiaomi Mi Portable Bluetooth Speaker is a compact, travel‑friendly speaker designed to bring powerful, rich sound wherever you go. Despite its small size, it delivers clear audio with dual drivers, offers up to 10 hours of music playback on a single charge, and resists dust and water — making it ideal for both indoor use and outdoors. With Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity and optional stereo pairing, it’s a versatile choice for music, calls, and portable audio needs.
features: Dual Drivers: For balanced, full‑range sound with clear detail and good bass.
Up to 10 Hours Play Time: 2000 mAh battery lets you enjoy music for long sessions on a full charge.
Bluetooth 5.0: Ensures stable, fast wireless connection with phones, tablets and other devices.
True Wireless Stereo (TWS) Mode: You can pair two units for stereo left-right sound for a more immersive experience.
IP67 Dustproof & Water‑Resistant: Protected against dust and water splashes, good for outdoor use or near water.
Compact & Portable: Small enough to fit in your bag or palm, making it easy to carry everywhere.
USB‑C Charging: Modern and convenient charging method.
Built‑in Microphone & Call Support: Lets you take calls directly through the speaker for convenience.
10 m Wireless Range: Reliable connection up to about 10 meters in open spaces.

name: Xiaomi Smart Standing Fan 2 Pro
description: The Xiaomi Smart Standing Fan 2 Pro is a modern, portable standing fan that blends smart‑control convenience with powerful, natural airflow. It runs on a rechargeable battery (so you’re not tied to a wall socket), offers ultra‑quiet, energy‑efficient operation, and lets you control airflow, speed, oscillation, and more, either manually, via app, or by voice. Ideal for homes, offices, or spaces where mobility and silent performance matter.
features: Wireless & Portable: Runs on a built‑in 33.6 Wh lithium‑ion battery, so you can place it anywhere without needing a constant power plug.
Up to ~18 Hours Battery Life: On low speed (with oscillation), the fan can run about 18 hours on a full charge; on higher speed with oscillation, about 2.7 hours.
7+5 Double‑Layer Fan Blades: Dual‑layer blades create a softer, more natural breeze by reducing air vortex and spreading airflow more evenly.
Wide & Long‑Range Airflow: 140° oscillation and up to 14 m ventilation range. Enough to cool a whole room.
100 Precise Speed Levels: Through the companion app you can finely adjust air flow to suit your comfort needs.
Brushless DC Motor (BLDC): More energy‑efficient, quieter, and longer-lasting than traditional AC motors, while delivering stable airflow.
Ultra‑Quiet Operation: Noise levels range from as low as ~28.1 dB(A) (very quiet) to a maximum ~56.3 dB(A) at highest airflow. Roughly comparable to gentle rain up to normal conversation.
Smart Controls: Compatible with the Mi Home app and supports AI voice control (via voice assistants), for remote and hands‑free operation.
Dual Use: Floor or Table: Adjustable height and detachable stand make it easy to use on the floor or a desk/table.
Magnetic Charging Dock with Indicator: Easy to charge and check battery status; charging stops automatically when full to protect battery health.

name: Xiaomi Body Scale 2 Pro
description: The Xiaomi Mi Body Composition Scale 2 is a sleek, smart bathroom scale that doesn’t just show your weight. It uses bioelectrical impedance and Bluetooth to deliver a full-body health overview (body fat, muscle mass, water, bone, metabolism, etc.) to your phone. It supports multiple user profiles, syncs seamlessly with the companion app, and works as a compact, modern fitness tool for the whole family.
features: Measures weight, body fat, muscle mass, water, bone mass, visceral fat, basal metabolic rate, BMI, protein, body score and other body composition metrics. Up to 13 data points.
High‑precision sensor accurate to ±50 g: Detects small changes reliably.
Supports 100 g–150 kg weight range, with units switchable between kilograms, pounds, and others.
Connects via Bluetooth 5.0 to send data automatically to the app for tracking over time.
Can store up to 16 distinct user profiles. Ideal for family use.
Sleek, minimalist design: sturdy tempered-glass top, hidden LED display that lights up when you step on it, and non‑slip surface.
Also features body balance test (standing on one foot with eyes closed) to help assess stability and balance.
Battery powered: Uses 4 × AAA batteries, with long battery life.
Compatible with Android and iOS (via companion app) and can sync data to health platforms (e.g. Google Fit, Apple Health via Mi Fit or similar apps) for comprehensive tracking.

name: Xiaomi Smart Scale 2
description: The Mi Smart Scale 2 is a sleek, lightweight smart scale that measures your body weight accurately and syncs the data via Bluetooth to your phone. It’s great for daily weight tracking, making it easy to monitor changes over time, whether for fitness, health or general wellness.
features: High‑precision sensors: Detect changes from as little as 50 g.
Weighing range from 100 g up to 150 kg: suitable for adults, children, and even small items.
Dual mode for people and objects: Can weigh human body or small items/packages.
Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity: Syncs data to your phone smoothly.
Supports up to 16 user profiles: Odeal for family use; automatically recognizes different users.
Hidden LED display: Clean, minimalist design; display lights up when you step on the scale.
Compact, modern design: Tempered‑glass top with rounded edges; fits well in any home setting.
Measures and tracks weight history and trends via companion app: Helps monitor progress over time.

name: Xiaomi Mi Smart Electric Toothbrush T500
description: The Mi Smart Electric Toothbrush T500 uses a powerful sonic motor and smart sensors to clean teeth more deeply and gently than a regular toothbrush. It adapts to your brushing style (“smart over‑pressure protection”), connects to an app for brushing data, and offers customizable cleaning modes — making it a practical everyday choice for oral care.
features: High‑frequency sonic motor: Vibrates ~31,000 times per minute for effective plaque and stain removal.
Smart over‑pressure protection: Detects if you’re brushing too hard and reduces vibration to protect gums.
Customizable cleaning modes: Standard, soft (for sensitive gums), and custom modes to match user preferences.
Position detection & app data: Tracks brushing angle, coverage, pressure events, and gives brushing performance feedback via app.
High‑density, metal‑free (anti‑rust) brush head with soft bristles for hygienic cleaning.
IPX7 waterproof: Fully washable, safe for shower or bathroom use.
Long battery life: Rechargeable battery, with up to ~18 days of usage per charge according to official specs.
Wireless inductive charging: Convenient charging without plugging directly into the brush.

name: Xiaomi Mi Electric Shaver S500
description: The Xiaomi Mi Electric Shaver S500 is a compact, waterproof electric shaver built for comfort and precision. Its 360° floating shaving heads adapt to your facial contours to deliver a close shave. Whether you prefer dry or wet shaving. The S500 is easy to use, portable, and rechargeable via USB‑C, making it a convenient grooming tool for home or travel.
features: 360° Floating Shaver‑Heads: Three flexible heads that adjust to facial curves for a clean, even shave.
Dual‑Layer / Twin‑Blade Cutting System: Lifts and cuts hair efficiently for smoother results.
IPX7 Waterproof Body: Fully washable, supports both wet and dry shaving.
LED Digital Display: Shows battery level, speed mode, cleaning/maintenance reminders, and travel‑lock status.
Two Shaving Modes (Standard & Speed/Turbo): Choose a gentle shave or a more powerful mode for thick beards.
USB‑C Charging & Plug‑and‑Play Use: Rechargeable for ~60 min of usage per charge; can be used while charging.
Compact & Travel‑Friendly Design: Portable size and light enough for easy carrying.

name: Mi Electric Shaver S500 Replacement Head
description: The replacement head restores your S500 to “like‑new” shaving performance: with dual‑track foils, twin‑blade cutters, and precision‑machined steel parts, it delivers a close, clean shave, even on short stubble while remaining washable and easy to install.
features: Dual‑track foils + Twin‑blade system: Inner and outer tracks with a total of 15 blades for 50 % more hair intake vs a single‑track shaver.
Secondary lifting foil (0.08 mm): Lifts hairs before the main blades cut them, improving closeness and reducing missed stubble.
High‑quality imported steel + ECM-finished foils: Foils and blades are finished using electrochemical machining for a smoother surface, fewer burrs, and better wear resistance.
360° floating / “Infinite Float” design: The head adjusts to facial contours for a comfortable and evenly close shave.
Waterproof & washable (IPX7): Safe for wet or dry shaving, and easy to clean under running water.
Easy to install / replace: Designed to snap into place on the original shaver without tools.
Compatible with Xiaomi Mi Electric Shaver S500 only: Not guaranteed to work with other Xiaomi shaver models.

name: Xiaomi Mi TV Stick Streaming Stick 4K 2022
description: Turn any regular TV into a Smart‑TV with the Xiaomi Mi TV Stick 4K. A compact streaming stick running Android TV/Google TV. It delivers sharp 4K HDR video, supports major streaming apps, and lets you control everything with a voice‑enabled remote and Chromecast built-in.
features: Streams video in 4K Ultra HD with HDR support: For crisp, vibrant visuals on compatible TVs.
Android TV / Google TV OS: Easy access to popular streaming services and apps.
Built‑in Chromecast: Cast videos, music, or photos from your phone, tablet or laptop directly to the TV.
Voice Remote with Google Assistant: Control playback, search, and smart‑home devices with voice commands.
Dual‑band Wi‑Fi (2.4 GHz & 5 GHz): For stable and fast streaming connection.
Compact, plug‑and‑play design: Easy Setup through HDMI, and ideal for TVs without Smart‑TV features.

name: Xiaomi Mi Compact Bluetooth Speaker 2
description: The speaker is a tiny, ultra‑portable Bluetooth speaker that delivers clear, balanced sound despite its small size. It’s perfect for carrying in a bag or pocket, playing music on the go, and even making hands‑free calls.
features: 2 W powerful sound output: Compact but delivers solid audio.
Portable, lightweight, and easy to carry. Ideal for travel or outdoor use.
Built-in Bluetooth 4.2: Quick and stable connection up to ~10 m range.
Up to 6 hours playback on a single charge (at ~80 % volume).
Built‑in microphone: Supports hands‑free calling.
Simple controls: Power on/off, play/pause, call answer via a single button.
Compatible with many devices: Phone, tablet, laptop or any Bluetooth‑enabled music source.

name: Xiaomi Mi Smart Speaker
description: The Xiaomi Mi Smart Speaker brings rich, room-filling sound plus full smart-home and voice-assistant features. With built-in Google Assistant and Chromecast, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth support, and a powerful 12 W speaker tuned for deep bass and clear vocals, it’s a versatile choice for music, smart-home control, and hands-free convenience.
features: 12 W full-frequency speaker with 63.5 mm driver for powerful, balanced sound.
Audio tuned by DTS / HARMAN AudioEFX for distortion-free playback at any volume.
Built-in Google Assistant: Use voice commands to play music, check weather, set alarms, control smart devices, and more.
Built-in Chromecast. Stream music, movies, or shows from your phone, tablet, or laptop directly to the speaker (or cast to TV).
Wi-Fi (2.4 GHz / 5 GHz) and Bluetooth 4.2 connectivity: Gives flexible streaming options.
Two far-field microphones with accurate voice wake-up: Lets the speaker pick up voice commands from across the room.
Touch-sensitive control panel on top: Manual control if you prefer not to use voice.
Compact, modern design: With a light ring on top for ambience and a small footprint that fits well in any room.

name: Xiaomi Mi Smart Clock
description: The Xiaomi Mi Smart Clock is a compact, smart display with built-in voice assistant that shows time, weather, calendar, and more, while doubling as a music player, smart-home controller, and alarm clock.
features: 4-inch touchscreen display (resolution 800×480): Shows time, weather, calendar events, commute info, news.
Built-in voice assistant (via “Ok Google”); Control alarms, get answers, play music, and control smart home devices with voice.
Full-range speaker (1.5inch): Can play music, podcasts or radio via online services.
Wi-Fi (2.4 GHz) and Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity: For Internet services, voice-assistant access, and pairing with other devices.
Smart-home hub capabilities: Use it to control compatible smart devices (lights, purifier, etc.) with voice or touch.
Chromecast support: Cast music, shows or videos from your phone or laptop directly to TV or speakers via the clock.
Compact & lightweight: About 272 g, and sized ~113 × 68 × 81.5 mm, so it fits on nightstand, desk or shelf.

name: Xiaomi Mi Portable Bluetooth Speaker 16W

features: 16 W total output (2× 8 W): Delivers balanced, loud audio with clear highs and decent bass.
Bluetooth 5.0 + AUX input: Easy wireless connection to phones, tablets or laptops; also supports 3.5 mm wired input.
IPX7 Waterproof: Resistant to water splashes, rain, or accidental spills: Use indoors or outdoors without worry.
Up to ~13 hours playback: Thanks to a 2600 mAh built-in battery, great for long listening sessions.
True Wireless Stereo (TWS): Pair two units for stereo left-right sound and fuller audio experience.
Built-in microphone & hands-free calling: Use the speaker to take calls directly, convenient for calls or meetings.
Wide frequency range (≈ 80 Hz–20 kHz): Covers bass to treble for balanced sound across music genres.
Portable design: Compact dimensions (~21.3 × 7.4 × 7.4 cm) and easy to carry, making it suitable for travel or outdoor use.

name: Xiaomi Mi Portable Bluetooth Speaker 16W
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 16W output, IPX7 waterproofing, TWS support and long battery life — available in Blue.
features: 16 W total output (2× 8 W): Delivers balanced, loud audio with clear highs and decent bass.
Bluetooth 5.0 + AUX input: Easy wireless connection to phones, tablets or laptops; also supports 3.5 mm wired input.
